AT.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
AT.description: Dracula ist erneut auferstanden, hat seine dunklen Diener um sich geschart und die Freundin von Richter Belmont entführt, um den Helden in dessen Untergang zu locken. Als Richter, Nachkomme des ursprünglichen Vampirjägers Simon Belmont, greifst du zur legendären Peitsche und nimmst den Kampf gegen die Bewohner von Draculas Schloss auf. Du verwendest mächtige Waffen und mystische Power-Ups, entdeckst geheime Bonuslevel und stellst dich in sieben Leveln der höllischen Action. Du versuchst, der Familie Belmont alle Ehre zu machen und Dracula in ein Häufchen Staub zu verwandeln. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

EE.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
EE.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Castlevania Dracula X
CA.description: After rising from his eternal sleep, Count Dracula summons his dark minions--Cerberus, Minaurus and the Salamander--to bring a reign of terror on the land. In order to lure the latest Belmont descendant, Dracula kidnaps Annette Renard and her sister Maria as bait. Gear up as Richter Belmont, equipped with the legendary Vampire Killer, in his strife to save his beloved. Battling against the monsters that lurk in the shadows, strategically using magical tomes, mystical power-ups and titanic weapons and discovering secret bonus levels. Unfold another chapter in the Belmont family's lineage, with over 7 stages of grim encounters and a myriad of possibilities depending on the choices that you make.

GB.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
GB.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
ES.description: Tras resurgir una vez más, el conde Drácula ha reunido a sus diabólicos secuaces y ha capturado a la novia de Richter Belmont con el solo objetivo de acabar con nuestro héroe. Métete en la piel de este descendiente del primer cazavampiros, Simon Belmont, y empuña el látigo legendario. Lucha contra los moradores del castillo de Drácula, usa armas poderosas y mejoras místicas, y descubre fases secretas a medida que recorres siete niveles repletos de acción. Deja tu impronta en el linaje de los Belmont ¡y reduce a Drácula a cenizas! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

GR.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
GR.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: Castlevania Dracula X
BR.description: Após acordar do seu sono eterno, o Conde Drácula convoca os seus perversos subordinados, Cerberus, Minaurus e Salamander para aterrorizar o reino. A fim de chamar a atenção do descendente da família Belmont, o Drácula sequestra Annette Renard e a sua irmã Maria para usá-las como isca. Equipe-se como Richter Belmont, usando o legendário chicote Vampire Killer, em sua luta para salvar a sua amada. Lute contra monstros que se escondem nas trevas, usando livros de magia de forma estratégica, power-ups místicos e armas extraordinárias, e descubra níveis secretos de bônus. Revele um novo capítulo da linhagem da família Belmont, com mais de 7 estágios repletos de duelos repugnantes e um incontável número de possibilidades que dependem das suas decisões.

BE.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
BE.description: Dracula est une fois de plus ressuscité et a fait appel à ses effrayants sbires pour capturer la petite amie de Richter Belmont, afin d'attirer celui-ci dans ses filets. Incarnez Richter, le descendant du fameux tueur de vampires Simon Belmont, brandissez votre fouet légendaire et affrontez les résidents du château de Dracula. À travers sept niveaux d'action terrifiants, utilisez vos puissantes armes et vos améliorations mystiques et découvrez des niveaux bonus secrets. Faites honneur à la lignée des Belmont et réduisez Dracula en poussière ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

LT.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
LT.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Castlevania Dracula X
MX.description: Al despertar de su sueño eterno, el conde Drácula invoca a sus secuaces, Cerberus, Minaurus y Salamander, para que aterroricen la población. Para atrapar al último descendiente de la familia Belmont, Drácula secuestra a Annette Renard y a su hermana Maria y las usa como anzuelo. Juega como Richter Belmont y equípalo con el legendario látigo matavampiros para ayudarlo en su misión de salvar a su amada. Enfréntate a los monstruos que acechan en las tinieblas, usando estratégicamente los tomos mágicos, misteriosos objetos y colosales armas, y descubre los niveles secretos. Adéntrate en este capítulo del linaje de la familia Belmont, con siete etapas de espeluznantes encuentros y numerosas posibilidades que se desarrollarán dependiendo de las decisiones que tomes.

NL.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
NL.description: Dracula is herrezen. Hij heeft zijn duistere legers verzameld en de vriendin van Richter Belmont ontvoerd in de hoop hem naar zijn ondergang te lokken. Richter, een nakomeling van de vampierenjager Simon Belmont, hanteert de legendarische zweep en levert strijd met de bewoners van Dracula’s kasteel. Gebruik machtige wapens en mystieke vaardigheden, en ontdek geheime bonuslevels in je tocht door zeven helse levels bomvol actie. Treed in de voetsporen van je voorvader en versla Dracula! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

HU.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
HU.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! MT.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
MT.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
IT.description: Il conte Dracula è risorto dalle tenebre chiamando a raccolta i suoi oscuri seguaci! Questa volta ha rapito la fidanzata di Richter Belmont con il solo obiettivo di togliere di mezzo il nostro eroe una volta per tutte. Vesti i panni di Richter, erede del leggendario ammazzavampiri Belmont, impugna la frusta mistica e stermina le creature che popolano il castello di Dracula. Attraversa sette livelli d'azione infernale sfoderando potenti armi e potenziamenti soprannaturali. Dimostra di essere all'altezza della tua stirpe e trasforma il signore dei vampiri in cenere! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NZ.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
NZ.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! NO.name: Castlevania® Dracula X

Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
PT.description: Dracula regressou das trevas uma vez mais, reuniu os seus súbditos demoníacos e capturou a amada de Richter Belmont com o único objetivo de a utilizar como engodo para destruir o nosso herói de uma vez por todas. Na pele de Richter, descendente do caçador de vampiros original, Simon Belmont, empunha o lendário chicote e luta contra os habitantes do castelo de Dracula. Utiliza armas poderosas e power-ups místicos e descobre níveis secretos de bónus, à medida que te aventuras ao longo de sete níveis infernais. Deixa a tua marca na linhagem Belmont e reduz o Dracula a cinzas! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

SE.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
SE.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. As Richter, descendent of the original slayer Simon Belmont, wield the legendary whip and do battle against the denizens of Dracula's castle. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! PL.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
PL.description: Dracula has risen once again, summoning his dark minions, and capturing the girlfriend of Richter Belmont as bait to lure the hero to his doom. Wield powerful weapons and mystical power-ups and discover secret bonus levels as you venture through seven levels of hellish action. Make your mark in the Belmont lineage and turn Dracula to dust! This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
RU.description: Жестокому графу Дракуле не по нраву загробная жизнь: он снова вернулся в мир живых, призвал на помощь служителей зла и похитил возлюбленную главного героя Рихтера Бельмонта, чтобы заманить того в смертельную ловушку. Рихтер — потомок прославленного охотника на вампиров Симона Бельмонта. Вооружившись фамильным кнутом, он отправляется в замок Дракулы. Помогите ему найти мощное оружие и волшебные зелья, пройти семь уровней замка, населенного нечистью, и открыть тайные уровни. Впишите свою страницу в историю славного рода Бельмонт и превратите Дракулу в кучку праха! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

FR.name: Castlevania® Dracula X
FR.description: Dracula est une fois de plus ressuscité et a fait appel à ses effrayants sbires pour capturer la petite amie de Richter Belmont, afin d'attirer celui-ci dans ses filets. Incarnez Richter, le descendant du fameux tueur de vampires Simon Belmont, brandissez votre fouet légendaire et affrontez les résidents du château de Dracula. À travers sept niveaux d'action terrifiants, utilisez vos puissantes armes et vos améliorations mystiques et découvrez des niveaux bonus secrets.
